author: REDACCIÓN
title: ¿Qué artistas se presentarán en el Festival Internacional del Globo en León? | La Silla Rota
text: León.- Después de que se comenzarán a vender los boletos para el Festival Internacional del Globo (FIG) 2024, el día de hoy fueron confirmados 2 artistas que estarán en el segundo día. Mediante un video en las redes sociales, el FIG confirmó la presencia de 2 referentes de la música electrónica en el mundo; Marshmello y Armin van Buuren, los cuales se presentarán el 16 de noviembre. Te podría interesar Armin es un artista que desde muy joven comenzó en la música. Cuando trabajaba de repartidor de periódicos se gastaba todo su dinero en música y una vez que su madre se ganó una computadora, su amor por la tecnología despertó y empezó a crear las primeras mezclas que más tarde lo llevarían a convertirse en los DJ´s más reconocidos y laureados del mundo. Por otro lado, Marshmello será quien acompañe a Armin en la segunda noche del FIG 24, el cual conocido por ser un artistas y productor enmascarado nominado al Grammy y que continúa rompiendo esquemas en la música electrónica al tener colaboración con Juice WRLD, Halsey, Khalid, Demi Lovato, Bastille, Kane Brown, Selena Gómez, Jonas Brothers, Manuel Turizo, PINK, Sting y mucho más, destacando que hace poco hizo una colaboración con la agrupación de regional mexicano Fuerza Regida. Los boletos para asistir al festival ya han sido lanzados a la venta, los cuales contarán con 2 fases para obtenerlos, en la primera se podrán adquirir más baratos que en ediciones anteriores. Además de los conciertos, los asistentes podrán disfrutar de amaneces llenos de color gracias a los más de 200 globos aerostáticos y una variedad de sorpresas adicionales. [SÍGUENOS EN EL SHOWCASE DE LA SILLA ROTA GUANAJUATO: EL PODER DE LA INFORMACIÓN EN LA PALMA DE TU MANO](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAqBwgKMO_Elwswpu6uAw?ceid=MX:es-419&oc=3) ¿Cuánto cuestan los boletos para el FIG 2024? Los boletos se pueden comprar mediante la página [www.eticket.mx ](https://www.eticket.mx/)y en la plataforma BoletosFIG, así como también estarán disponibles en las tiendas Oxxo. Matutino - Fase 1: $240 - Fase 2: $290 Vespertino - Fase 1: $420 - Fase 2: $470 Day Pass - Fase 1: $570 - Fase 2: $620 Abono - Fase 1: $1,400 - Fase 2: $1,800 VIP - Fase 1: $2,500 - Fase 2: $2,800 [ÚNETE A NUESTRO CANAL DE WHATSAPP. EL PODER DE LA INFORMACIÓN EN LA PALMA DE TU MANO ](https://www.whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va6evSkGk1Ftej78ks0B)

author: @WIFRTV
title: Animal Rescue Expo coming to UW Sports Factory on 3/15
text:
Animal Rescue Expo coming to UW Sports Factory on 3/15
ROCKFORD, Ill. (WIFR) - Lisa’s Little Rescue will host the inaugural Animal Rescue Expo from 11 a.m. to 4 p.m. on Saturday, March 11 at the UW Sports Factory.
More than 100 exhibitors will be at the event covering a variety of topics from adoption, shopping and services, entertainment and education.
Lisa Beardsworth, Lisa’s Little Rescue owner, says whether you are interested in adopting, fostering, volunteering or just love animals, the Animal Rescue Expo is the place to be.
Tickets cost $5 and proceeds benefit the Kibble Korner Pet Food Pantry. Kids under the age of 12 and veterans with a military ID get in for free.
Guests can also bring a bag of dog or cat food to receive a raffle ticket. Raffle basket winners will be drawn at 4 p.m. Saturday.
The St. Patrick’s Day parade will also be in downtown Rockford at the same time as the Animal Rescue Expo. Beardsworth recommends guests go East on Chestnut Street to reach the UW Sports Factory.
For more information on the Animal Rescue Expo or Lisa’s Little Rescue, click here.
Copyright 2025 WIFR. All rights reserved.

author: @TIMESNOW
title: Once Upon Two Times Movie Review: Family Drama About Estranged Exes Is Absorbing | Web Series News, Times Now
text: Once Upon Two Times Movie Review: Family Drama About Estranged Exes Is Absorbing The Hindi drama about the meeting of two families in marriage takes an unexpected turn in this Zee5 feature by Sonakshi Mittal. Once Upon Two Times Movie Review: Family Drama About Estranged Exes Is Absorbing About Once Upon Two Times Sonakshi Mittal's directorial debut, Once Upon Two Times, begins with the romance of two college classmates Ahaan (Anud Singh Dhaka) and Ruhi (Kashish Khan). After they decide to tie the knot, it's time for the families to meet, except there's a hitch. Their parents already know one another and didn't part on good terms. In fact, Ruhi's mother Purnima (Mrinal Kulkarni) was the ex-girlfriend of Ahaan's dad Kaushik (Sanjay Suri). These revelations all tumble out during a family get-together when the connections are unveiled and the older pair wonders about their past and their children's future. The Zee5 film also features the late Nitesh Pandey. Produced by Shashi Mittai, Sumeet Mittai and Ajay Rai, Once Upon Two Times is also written by Sonakshi Mittal. The family drama weaves into a bit of comedy once the secrets are all out in the open. But mostly the Hindi film looks at the issues of commitment and fidelity as it ties into the institution of marriage. Janhit Mein Jaari actor Dhaka and Khan play the central couple, but it is the older generation that draws in our interest. The dynamics of the elders and youngsters are intriguing as they try to work a way forward. Incidentally, this plotline was also seen in the 2022 Bengali film Kishmish and in an episode of the second season of Amazon Prime Video's Made In Heaven. Real-life couple Samir Soni and his wife Neelam played the older pair who had had a romance and now their children were set to be wed. End of Article Latest Movies Karan Johar,Sharmila Tagore,Saif Ali Khan Critic's Rating 4 Jason Schwartzman,Scarlett Johansson,Tom Hanks,Jeffrey Wright,Tilda Swinton Critic's Rating 3.5 Comedy,Drama,Period 1 hr 41 mins [Entertainment Videos](https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/entertainment) 33:15 The Archies star Vedang Raina's exclusive interview on bond with Khushi Kapoor, Alia Bhatt's Jigra 36:34 Dhak Dhak girls Fatima Sana Shaikh, Ratna Pathak Shah, Dia Mirza, Sanjana Sanghi interview 02:19 Emraan Hashmi refused to play Aditya Roy Kapur's role in Aashiqui 2 | Triptii Dimri's exotic vacation 02:20 Isha Koppikar's SHOCKING divorce | Neha Dhupia gets gifts for her kids 02:31 Shah Rukh Khan's Brilliant Comeback to Troll Slamming 'Jawan' and 'Dunki' Marketing

author: 刘崇懿
title: Green assets growing with afforestation projects - Chinadaily.com.cn
text:
Green assets growing with afforestation projects
With over 25 percent of its land surface covered by forests, China is the fastest and largest contributor to land greening efforts in the world, according to an official from the National Forestry and Grassland Administration.
On Wednesday, which marked the 47th National Tree Planting Day, the National Afforestation Commission released a communique on China's land greening status in 2024, highlighting progress made over the past year.
According to the document, China completed afforestation of 4.446 million hectares, improved 3.224 million hectares of land by planting grass, and reclaimed 2.783 million hectares of desertified and sandy land in 2024. The forest coverage rate surpassed 25 percent, while the forest stock volume exceeded 20 billion cubic meters, it said.
Zhang Liming, director of the ecological protection and restoration department at the National Forestry and Grassland Administration, said, "Continuous efforts have been made by the country to expand forest areas, enhance forest quality and benefits, and manage forest resources, thereby increasing the nation's green assets."
Afforestation of a cumulative total of 77.3 million hectares has been completed nationwide since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China in 2012, making China the fastest and largest contributor to global greening efforts, he added.
According to the communique released by the National Afforestation Commission, significant achievements were made last year in the Three-North Shelterbelt Forest Program, which began in 1978 as a strategic project to establish large protective forests in key areas affected by sandstorms and soil erosion in Northwest, North and Northeast China.
With 32 billion yuan ($4.4 billion) of funding from the central government, more than 3.8 million hectares of land in these regions were restored last year, it said.
Notably, the Taklimakan Desert in the Xinjiang Uygur autonomous region, which is the largest desert in China, has been encircled by a sand-blocking green belt stretching 3,046 kilometers.
The document also praised the progress made in the systemic treatment of mountains, rivers, forests, fields, lakes, grasslands and deserts. A total of 176 projects on ecological protection and restoration in key regions and on ecological restoration support systems, as well as 27 projects for the integrated protection and restoration of the environment, have been carried out, with a cumulative treated area exceeding 5 million hectares, it said.
Moreover, ecological industries have brought increased benefits to the people, according to the document. The total output value of the forestry and grassland industry reached 10.17 trillion yuan, up 9.6 percent year-on-year. The production of forest food exceeded 200 million metric tons, making it the third-most important agricultural produce after grains and vegetables. Forest food refers to edible items produced in forests or woodlands, including fruits, flowers, leaves and branches.
The document highlighted that economic forests cover 46.667 million hectares in China, with an annual output value exceeding 2 trillion yuan, while 40 million hectares of forest land have been used for the under-forest economy, with an annual output value of about 1 trillion yuan.
The under-forest economy involves eco-friendly activities conducted under forest canopies, such as planting, breeding, wild produce gathering and ecotourism. Among these activities, ecotourism alone attracted 2.76 billion visitors last year, a 9.1 percent increase compared with 2023, the document said.

author: EFE
title: ¡Insólito! Sacerdote muerde a feligresa tras discutir en la comunión | El Universal.com
text: Un sacerdote de Florida es investigado por morder la mano de una feligresa durante la Eucaristía dominical en un supuesto “intento de defender la Comunión”, según la declaración jurada del caso citada este viernes por medios estadounidenses. El incidente ocurrió el pasado 19 de mayo en la Iglesia de Santo Tomás de Aquino en la ciudad de St. Cloud, al sur de Orlando. [ Vea aquí: Video: camioneta explota luego que su conductor intentó prender un cigarrillo](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/mundo/ee-uu/2024/05/25/video-camioneta-explota-luego-que-su-conductor-intento-prender-un-cigarrillo/) Según información de CNN, en la misa de la mañana el sacerdote Fidel Rodríguez se negó a darle la Comunión a una mujer porque ella no se había confesado. El sacerdote bendijo a la mujer y le aconsejó “recibir el sacramento de la Penitencia (confesión) antes de recibir la sagrada Eucaristía”, explicó en un comunicado la Diócesis de Orlando. La mujer regresó para la misa del mediodía y cuando fue a recibir la Comunión, el padre Rodríguez le preguntó nuevamente si se había confesado, y ella respondió que “no era asunto suyo”. Luego, la mujer metió la mano en la bandeja de la Comunión, agarró las hostias y comenzó a romperlas. El padre Rodríguez intentó sujetar a la mujer, pero ella se negó a detenerse. Durante el forcejeo, la feligresa empujó al sacerdote. En respuesta, él le mordió la mano. Publicidad Tras el incidente, la Diócesis defendió las acciones del padre Rodríguez.”Si bien la Diócesis de Orlando no tolera altercados físicos como este, de buena fe, el padre Rodríguez simplemente estaba intentando evitar un acto de profanación de la Sagrada Comunión, que, como sacerdote, está obligado a proteger”, dijeron en un comunicado. [Lea aquí: EE.UU. insta a China actuar con “moderación” y evitar “provocaciones” en Taiwán](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/mundo/2024/05/25/eeuu-insta-a-china-actuar-con-moderacion-y-evitar-provocaciones-en-taiwan/) El padre Rodríguez admitió lo sucedido a la Policía y dijo que estaba actuando en defensa propia. La mujer se negó a recibir atención médica y las autoridades fotografiaron la marca de la mordedura, según los documentos judiciales citados por CNN. La policía de St. Cloud ha enviado el caso a la Oficina del Fiscal de Florida para que decida si impone cargos al sacerdote.
